DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study compare day 0 maximum Lyapunov exponent ( lmax , indicator local dynamic stability ) chronic low back pain patient versus healthy volunteer match age ( ± 5 year ) , sex body mass index ( BMI ± 15 % low back pain patient ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Dynamic Stability Low Back Pain Patient
DOC.detailed_description: The secondary objective study : To compare lmax different experimental condition within group ( chronic low back pain patient , healthy volunteer ) . To compare change lmax low back pain patient D7 6 week .
DOC.criteria: General inclusion criterion : The patient/subject must give his/her inform sign consent The patient/subject must insure beneficiary health insurance plan Inclusion criterion low back pain patient : The patient chronic low back pain last 6 month postoperative nature General exclusion criterion : The patient/subject participate another study The patient/subject exclusion period determine previous study The patient/subject judicial protection , tutorship curatorship The patient/subject refuse sign consent It impossible correctly inform patient/subject The patient/subject pregnant , parturient , breastfeed Exclusion criterion low back pain patient : The patient history spinal surgery The patient history preexist postural disorder relate lumbalgia The patient undergone localized infiltration treatment ( e.g . cortisone shot ) last month The subject balance disorder , blindness , inability carry experimental protocol Exclusion criterion healthy volunteer : The subject history acute low back pain > 15 day result work stoppage 7 day 5 year precede study
